00161 ostream& operator<< (ostream& o, const projection_matrix& P);
00162 
00163 inline void projection_matrix::project(const double X, const double Y, const double Z, double * u, double * v)
00164 {
00165   if (have_to_recompute_P)
00166     compute_P();
00167 
00168   double M[4], PM[3];
00169   M[0] = X; M[1] = Y; M[2] = Z; M[3] = 1.;
00170   gfla_mul_mat_vect_3x4(P, M, PM);
00171 
00172   double inv_PM3 = 1 / PM[2];
00173   *u = inv_PM3 * PM[0];
00174   *v = inv_PM3 * PM[1];
00175 }
00176 
00177 inline void projection_matrix::project(const double X, const double Y, const double Z, float * u, float * v)
00178 {
00179   if (have_to_recompute_P)
00180     compute_P();
00181 
00182   double M[4], PM[3];
00183   M[0] = X; M[1] = Y; M[2] = Z; M[3] = 1.;
00184   gfla_mul_mat_vect_3x4(P, M, PM);
00185 
00186   double inv_PM3 = 1 / PM[2];
00187   *u = float(inv_PM3 * PM[0]);
00188   *v = float(inv_PM3 * PM[1]);
00189 }
